title: Google\Cloud\ResourceManager\V3\TagBinding
name: TagBinding
description:
A TagBinding represents a connection between a TagValue and a cloud resource (currently project, folder, or organization). Once a TagBinding is created, the TagValue is applied to all the descendants of the cloud resource.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.resourcemanager.v3.TagBinding

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Output only. The name of the TagBinding. This is a String of the form: tagBindings/{full-resource-name}/{tag-value-name} (e.g. tagBindings/%2F%2Fcloudresourcemanager.googleapis.com%2Fprojects%2F123/tagValues/456).

params.name: data.parent
params.description: The full resource name of the resource the TagValue is bound to. E.g. //cloudresourcemanager.googleapis.com/projects/123

params.name: data.tag_value
params.description: The TagValue of the TagBinding. Must be of the form tagValues/456.
